reg_pit.acttitle: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act
reg_pit.title: Expected Revenue Outcome for the 2010/2011 Fiscal Year Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 29/2022, effective February 15, 2022.

reg.acttitle: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act
reg.title: Expected Revenue Outcome for the 2010/2011 Fiscal Year Regulation

section.sectiontext: For the purposes of section 5 (2) of the Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act,

paragraph.paragraphtext: the sources of actual revenue for the 2010/2011 fiscal year are specified as audit and revenue compliance related activities in respect of taxes, resource royalties and other revenues payable under enactments administered by the revenue minister, and
the amount of actual revenue in the 2010/2011 fiscal year from the revenue sources referred to in paragraph (a) is specified as $185 325 000.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 164/2009.
content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act, S.B.C. 2001, c. 28, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 9]
